columns.Description: Unique identifier for the piece of information gathered
columns.Name: IgId

columns.Description: Name of the field where this information appears in the AdditionalFields column of the DeviceTvmInfoGathering table
columns.Name: FieldName

columns.Description: List of categories that the information belongs to, in JSON array format
columns.Name: Categories

columns.Description: The data structure of the information gathered
columns.Name: DataStructure
